instructions: # Firefly RPG Character SheetEditing attributes, skills, etc is straightforward. Mouseover the dice image to change its value.### Dice Pool Rolling*This is Mentor feature only.*This sheet integrates with the `CortexPlus-DicePool.js` API script to handle dice pool building and rolling.All attributes, skills, distinctions, etc have roll buttons to add the corresponding value to the dice pool.The script must be added to your campaign in order to work. If it is not added, then the buttons will not do anything.
